column1: authors:  Allen J. Beck, Ph.D. and Christopher J. Mumola
Table 20. Trends in State prison releases, release rates, and time served
Note:  All data are limited to prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year
and exclude escapees, AWOLs, and transfers.
a/Includes all inmates released for the first time on the current sentence.
Time served is based on prison time only and excludes jail time credits.
b/The number of releases per 100 State prisoners at the beginning of each year plus
the number admitted during the year.
